title: CM asks people to follow COVID-19 SOPs
content:
LAHORE, Dec 22 (APP):Punjab Chief Minister Sardar Usman Buzdar has appealed to citizens to follow the COVID-19 standard operation procedures (SOPs) and avoid going to populous areas as the observance of necessary precautionary measures was the best way to deal with the virus.
In a statement issued here on Tuesday, he said that he had quarantined himself currently, but he was performing his important matters from home.
â€œI am feeling better now with the grace of Almighty Allah and the prayers of the people, he added.
